DOC.brief_summary: Patients chronic venous disease cause pain ache randomise two group , active stocking ( 18-21 mmHg ) placebo stocking
DOC.detailed_description: Patients chronic venous disease cause pain ache satisfy inclusion exclusion criterion randomise two group , active stocking ( 18-21 mmHg ) placebo stocking . The primary outcome study ( pain/ache score use visual analogue scale ) number secondary symptom , sign rVCSS ( revise Venous Clinical Severity Score ) obtain baseline one week wear active placebo stocking .
DOC.criteria: Primary varicose vein cause pain/ache locate calf level Venous ulceration Dermatitis Itching Superficial vein thrombosis Peripheral arterial disease Symptoms nonvenous origin Previous use elastic stocking
